sn48.59:1: At S훮vatth카. "Bhikkhus, these five faculties, developed and cultivated, if unarisen do not arise apart from the appearance of a Tath훮gata, an Arahant, a Perfectly Enlightened One. What five? The faculty of faith, the faculty of energy, the faculty of mindfulness, the faculty of concentration, the faculty of wisdom. These five faculties, developed and cultivated, if unarisen do not arise apart from the appearance of a Tath훮gata, an Arahant, a Perfectly Enlightened One."
